dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
The original map was drawn by Pietro Vesconte in ca. 1320.
Appears in Marino Sanuto's Liber secretorum fidelium crucis. Hanau: Christian Wechelius.
